title: Microelectronics: From Fundamentals to Applied Design [2015] [PD
description:
Title: Microelectronics: From Fundamentals to Applied Design 
Author: Maurizio Di Paolo Emilio 
Format: PDF 
Hardcover: 100 pages 
Publisher: Springer; 1st ed. 2016 edition (August 20, 2015) 
Language: English 
ISBN: 9783319225449 


This book serves as a practical guide for practicing engineers who need to design analog circuits for microelectronics. Readers will develop a comprehensive understanding of the basic techniques of analog modern electronic circuit design, discrete and integrated, application as sensors and control and data acquisition systems,and techniques of PCB design.

Â· Describes fundamentals of microelectronics design in an accessible manner;
Â· Takes a problem-solving approach to the topic, offering a hands-on guide for practicing engineers;
Â· Provides realistic examples to inspire a thorough understanding of system-level issues, before going into the detail of components and devices;
Â· Uses a new approach and provides several skills that help engineers and designers retain key and advanced concepts
